hadiths.text: Narrated Sa`d:I heard the Prophet (ﷺ) saying, "None plots against the people of Medina but that he will be dissolved (destroyed) like the salt is dissolved in water

chapter.ara-name: باب إِثْمِ مَنْ كَادَ أَهْلَ الْمَدِينَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Sin of that person who harms the people of Al-Madina
